snippet: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said that continued public disputes among high officials were giving ammunition to “foreign media and enemies,” and would be treated as treason.
abstract: Iran's supreme leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei says political infighting among high-ranking officials is giving ammunition to 'foreign media and enemies,' and declares that such public disputes will be treated as treason if they continue.
lead_paragraph: Ayatollah Ali Khamenei said that continued public disputes among high officials were giving ammunition to “foreign media and enemies,” and would be treated as treason.

headline.seo: Iran Ayatollah Warns Subordinates to Stop Bickering
headline.main: Iran Supreme Leader Warns Subordinates to Stop Bickering
headline.print_headline: Iran Supreme Leader Warns Subordinates to Stop Bickering
